results.name: Number triangle associated to Chebyshev polynomials of the second kind.
comment: Compare the definition of U_n(x) with the definition of the Dirichlet kernel.
U_n(x) is a polynomial in x with integer coefficients for all n >=0.
link: T. D. Noe, Rows n = 0..100 of triangle, flattened
formula: The polynomials can be computed with U_{n+1}(x) = 2xU_n(x) - U_{n-1}(x), U_{n+1}(x) = ((U_n(x))^2-1)/U_{n-1)(x), where in each case U_0(x) = 1; U_1(x) = 2x.
